text: Q.27 Consider the following statements: I. If a language L is finite, then the minimal DFA accepting L contains no cycle. IL. If D is a DFA having n states, and a string w is accepted by D, such that |w| >= n, then the DFA must contain a cycle. III. Every DFA accepting a finite language must contain a dead state. Which of the above statements are true? e L, 1I but not I e I1, 111 but not I O Only 11T o None of these
